answers.answer: measuring too big could be several things or nothing.  How far along are you?  Babies all grow at different rates and while yours may measure big right now, it could even out later in the pregnancy.  It could mean your dates are off, I don' tknow if that's possible.  Have you had an ultrasound yet at any point?
Yeah I had an ultrasound at 20 weeks they said he was doing all right. I am 24 weeks. What things can it mean???

I was measured big last week too along with an exam about a month ago but since they can't pick up the heartbeat just yet on the doppler they're thinking I may not be as far along as they thought and with the symptoms they're thinking twins so I get my us in 5 days to check for more than one baby and due date correction. Get an U/S. it will tell all :)

Well I heard the heartbeat so I dont know about that. And twins well I dont think so since last time I say the baby was 4 weeks ago and he alone. But yeah I see my ob now every two weeks so I guess she'll ask for an ultrasound next time I see her. I hope it's not bad :(

When I was 20 weeks I measured 22 weeks. But since then everything has evened out. I am measuring right on time now. My midwife said my uterus may have a growth spurt during that time and everything would catch up and it did. =)  How much bigger are you measuring?
oh ok I am not even sure. I blocked that part out she just told me you are mesuring big. If she calls me today with my results for the blood work I will ask her.

Ok. Yea find out if you can, it's pretty common at certain stages in pregnancy to either be measuring about 2 weeks smaller or 2 weeks bigger. They will just make sure everything catches up and usually it does.
Thanks everyone when do you think I would have the results for my blood work(diabetes test)?

question: So yesterday I had my ob appointment. I just heard the baby's heartbea, got measured and had blood work done. The baby's heartbeat is doing great! But my doctor said I was mearsuring to big which she said means that baby might be to big??? Is that bad??? The blood work was to check if I have to much sugar in my blood.
title: Update on Ob Appt.
